This test exercises the 'font-style' property in CSS computed styles.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS computedFontStyle('normal') is 'normal'
PASS computedFontStyle('oblique') is 'italic'
PASS computedFontStyle('italic') is 'italic'
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
